column4: anyone know how to connect to a subversion server though a socks5 proxy
How about a tsocks wrapper command.
Use the 'tsocks' package to get the 'tsocks' command. You configure a proxy with /etc/tsocks.conf file. You run a command transparently using a proxy with 'tsocks command'.
I don't understand the distinction you make between 'connect' vs. 'checkout'.
